Action.author: rickr
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 Not following. If you don't do any *addAttrReq* calls to the EnrollementRequest you won't get in the json any *"attr_reqs"* properties in the json at all. So in essence it is _optional_. If you want an empty *"attr_reqs"* all you need call on the EnrollementRequest is invoke *addAttrReq()*.

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: Thanks – see now it's a pending change.
